title: Write CategoryService Tests
description: Create unit tests for the CategoryService class.
instructions:
Write tests for CategoryService that cover:
1. Creating a category successfully
2. Throwing exception when category name already exists for user
3. Getting all categories for a user
4. Deleting a category (and verifying tasks are not deleted, just unlinked)

hints.text: Use when().thenReturn() to set up mock behavior before calling the service method.
For the delete test, verify that taskRepository.unlinkCategory() is called before categoryRepository.delete().
